name: Acquisition of property
text:
For the purposes of this part, the director of transportation may acquire for controlled-access facilities and service roads:



	(1)	Property, as defined in chapter 101, by gift, devise, or purchase; or
	(2)	Property by eminent domain under chapter 101. [L 1960, c 3, pt of §2; Supp, §111-46; HRS ]
